title: Soils of tropical rainforests low in nutrients

content.question: Which of the following best describes soil in many tropical rain forests?

choices.label: They are quickly depleted nutrients when the forest is removed.
They are similar to soils in grasslands.
They are well suited for growing a wide variety of crops.
They are deep and well drained.

content.answer: They are quickly depleted nutrients when the forest is removed.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe environmental concepts and processes.
